itemInfo.itemDesc: A Trade Item containing 10 Zinc Ore.

item.name: Zinc Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Omar Lava Cave, Abandoned Iron Mine, and Ancient Fissure. It can be directly obtained from Ore containing Zinc.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
